---
title: "Linear Regression on Percentage Change"
author: "Lyndsey Umsted"
date: '2022-07-13'
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(dplyr)
getwd()
HFI <- read.csv("data/HFI.csv")
HFI <- subset(HFI, HFI$c_leish_incidence > 0)
small_data <- HFI %>%
  select(c("year", "c_leish_incidence"))

```

```{r}
library(MASS)
y <- HFI$c_leish_incidence
x1 <- HFI$crop_perc_change
x2 <- HFI$pasture_perc_change
x3<- HFI$forest_perc_change
x4 <- HFI$urban_perc_change
x5 <- HFI$year
x6 <- HFI$human_footprint
x7 <- HFI$forest
x8 <- HFI$urban
x9 <- HFI$mammal_richness
x10 <- HFI$annual_pre
x11 <- HFI$annual_tmp
x12 <- HFI$annual_wet

fit <- glm.nb(y ~ x1, data = small_data)

plot(x5, x10)

summary(fit)

plot(fit)

library(ggplot2)

ggplot(small_data, x = x5) +
  geom_bar(data = small_data, aes(y), col = "red")
```


BoxCox:
```{r}
library(MASS)
boxcox(fit, plotit = T, lambda = seq(0,.1,len = 100))
```

```{r}
y2 <- y^0.03

fit2 <- lm(y2 ~ x1+x2+x3+x4, data = small_data)

summary(fit2)

plot(fit2)
```


```{r}
y3 <- log(y)

plot(x8, y3)

fit3 <- lm(y3 ~ x1+x2+x3+x4)

summary(fit3)

plot(fit3)
```
